page.title: 14INDUSTRY
page.content: This area is almost entirely rural and therefore there is very little industry to be found actually in the area.The exception is the Milk Marketing Board Creamery.This Creamery is situated near the Polstrong roundabout and is clearly visible from the main roads.As well as producing cream,the creamery produces powdered milk.We were hoping to visit this site but this proved impossible owing to the MMB regulations on visits.The parents of several of the children in this school work at this creamery. All other industry which employs people who live in our survey area is outside of our survey area.
